zh.Home.Home.462689-1: 高效、易用、功能强大的API管理平台
zh.Home.Home.462689-2: 旨在为开发、产品、测试人员提供更优雅的接口管理服务
zh.Home.Home.462689-4: 为API开发者设计的管理平台
zh.Home.Home.462689-5: YApi让接口开发更简单高效，让接口的管理更具可读性、可维护性，让团队协作更合理。
zh.Home.Home.462689-7: 提供基本的项目分组，项目管理，接口管理功能
zh.Home.Home.462689-9: 友好的接口文档，基于websocket的多人协作接口编辑功能和类postman测试工具，让多人协作成倍提升开发效率
zh.Home.Home.462689-10: 基于Mockjs，使用简单功能强大
zh.Home.Home.462689-11: 功能强大的 Mock 服务
zh.Home.Home.462689-12: 你想要的 Mock 服务都在这里
zh.Home.Home.462689-14: 通过学习一些简单的 Mock模板规则即可轻松编写接口，这将大大提高定义接口的效率，并且无需为编写 Mock 数据烦恼: 所有的数据都可以实时随机生成。
zh.Home.Home.462689-18: 生成的 Mock 数据可以直接用 ajax 请求使用，也可以通过服务器代理使用（不需要修改项目一行代码）
zh.Home.Home.462689-26: 管理分组或项目的信息
zh.Home.Home.462689-31: 不允许修改分组或项目信息
zh.Home.Home.462689-33: 接口管理的逻辑较为复杂，操作频率高，层层审批将严重拖慢生产效率，因此传统的金字塔管理模式并不适用。
zh.Home.Home.462689-34: 将扁平化管理模式的思想引入到产品的权限管理中，超级管理员拥有最高的权限，并将权限分配给若干组长，超级管理员只需管理组长即可，实际上管理YAPI各大分组与项目的是“组长”。组长对分组或项目负责，一般由BU负责人/项目负责人担任。
zh.Home.Home.462689-36: 注册账号尽请使用吧，查看使用文档了解更多信息

en.Home.Home.462689-1: An efficient, easy-to-use, and powerful API management platform
en.Home.Home.462689-2: Intended to provide more elegant interface management services for developers, products, and testers
en.Home.Home.462689-4: A management platform designed for API developers
en.Home.Home.462689-5: YApi makes interface development simpler and more efficient, interface management more readable and maintainable, and team collaboration more reasonable.
en.Home.Home.462689-7: Provide basic project grouping, project management, and interface management functions
en.Home.Home.462689-9: Friendly interface documentation, WebSocket based multi person collaboration interface editing function, and Postman like testing tool, enabling multi person collaboration to double development efficiency
en.Home.Home.462689-10: Based on Mockjs, simple to use and powerful in functionality
en.Home.Home.462689-12: All the mock services you want are here
en.Home.Home.462689-14: By learning some simple Mock template rules, it is easy to write interfaces, which greatly improves the efficiency of defining interfaces and eliminates the hassle of writing Mock data: all data can be randomly generated in real-time.
en.Home.Home.462689-18: The generated Mock data can be used directly through Ajax requests or through server proxies (without modifying a single line of project code)
en.Home.Home.462689-26: Manage information for groups or projects
en.Home.Home.462689-31: Modifying grouping or project information is not allowed
en.Home.Home.462689-33: The logic of interface management is relatively complex, with high operation frequency. Layered approval will seriously slow down production efficiency, so the traditional pyramid management model is not applicable.
en.Home.Home.462689-34: The idea of flat management mode is introduced into the permission management of products. Super administrators have the highest authority and assign it to several team leaders. Super administrators only need to manage the team leaders, but in reality, they are the "team leaders" who manage the major groups and projects of YAPI. The team leader is responsible for the grouping or project, usually held by the BU leader/project leader.
en.Home.Home.462689-35: Are you ready to use it?
en.Home.Home.462689-36: Please use all registered accounts and refer to the user documentation for more information
